pageProduct.name: Aveeno Active Naturals Skin Relief Moisturising Lotion Fragrance Free 354mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

AVEENO® Skin Relief Moisturising Lotion Fragrance-Free 354mL

Aveeno Active Naturals Skin Relief Moisturising Lotion with dimethicone skin protectant relieves sensitive or itchy, extra-dry skin and moisturises for 24 hours. Rich yet fast absorbing, this hydrating moisturiser starts to work immediately to nourish and restore essential moisture to very dry or sensitive skin so that it looks and feels healthier. 



  • Clinically shown to help relieve dry itchy skin

  • Moisturises for a full 24 hours to provide lasting protection against skin dehydration. 

  • Gentle enough to be used as a body moisturiser for sensitive skin.

  • Non greasy moisturiser absorbs quickly

  • Fragrance free

  • Contains colloidal oatmeal

  • Dermatologist recommended

  • Hypoallergenic

  • Significantly decreases itching in 2 minutes*



Significant improvement in the 4 symptoms of skin dryness (dryness, itchiness, scaling and roughness) in just 1 day*


  • Visibly improve skin textural properties after 2 weeks*


Aveeno Active Naturals are ingredients derived from nature and uniquely formulated to reveal skin's natural health and beauty.

Essential Active Naturals: Triple Oat Complex

Uses: Helps temporarily protect chafed, chapped or cracked skin.
* Dermatologist two week clinical study (C05-C141)

Size: 354mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Skin Relief Moisturising Lotion
• Moisturises for 24 Hours
• Fragrance Free
• Dermatologist Recommended










Ingredients

Water, Glycerine, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Petrolatum, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Extract, Steareth-20, Sodium Chloride, Benzyl Alcohol - (F#10620-115).

Directions

Apply on skin as needed. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove.
